import React, { useState, useEffect } from "react"; import { useNavigate } from "react-router-dom"; import { useWalletStore } from "../store/wallet"; import AccountSelector from "../components/AccountSelector"; import { ThemeToggle } from "../components/ThemeToggle"; const Landing: React.FC = () => { console.log("ðŸ” DEBUG: Landing component rendered - Version 2.0"); console.log("ðŸ” DEBUG: Current timestamp:", new Date().toISOString()); const navigate = useNavigate(); const { connectedAccounts, openAccountSelection } = useWalletStore(); const [isConnecting, setIsConnecting] = useState(false); useEffect(() => { // If user already has connected accounts, redirect to dashboard if (connectedAccounts.length > 0) { navigate("/dashboard"); } }, [connectedAccounts, navigate]); const handleConnect = async () => { setIsConnecting(true); try { await openAccountSelection(); } catch (error) { console.error("Failed to connect:", error); } finally { setIsConnecting(false); } }; return ( <>

Your Digital Shadow,
On-Chain Forever

Mirror your Web2 activity on a sovereign blockchain. Connect GitHub, Twitter, and more to create an immutable record of your digital footprint.

{/* Connect Wallet CTA */}

Start Your Journey

Connect your Polkadot wallet to begin archiving your digital legacy

No wallet? Get Polkadot.js

{/* Features Section */}

Built for the Future

Fully Encrypted

Your data is encrypted before storage. Only you can decrypt and view your content.

Distributed Storage

Leveraging IPFS and Polkadot for censorship-resistant, permanent storage.

True Ownership

Your keys, your data. No intermediaries, no gatekeepers, just you.

{/* How it Works */}

How It Works

Connect Your Wallet

Link your Polkadot wallet to establish your on-chain identity

2

Authorize Platforms

Connect your GitHub, Twitter, and other Web2 accounts

3

Automatic Archiving

Your activity is encrypted and stored on-chain automatically

4

Access Forever

View and verify your digital shadow anytime, forever
